mapper.insert: insert into boards(board_no, board_title, board_content, write_date, location, NUMBEROFPEOPLE, what, category, id, main_img) values(SEQ_board_no.nextval, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, #{location}, #{numberOfPeople}, #{what}, #{category}, #{id}, #{mainImg})
mapper.update: update boards set board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, location like '%'||#{location }||'%', NUMBEROFPEOPLE=#{numberOfPeople}, what like '%'||#{what }||'%', category=#{category}, main_img=#{mainImg} where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, main_img from boards
